Boots.description:
+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 35%.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Mercury's Treads
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and reduces duration of disabling effects
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Magic Resist UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 35%. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
+25 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 10% of the damage from basic attacks.
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Ninja Tabi
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and reduces incoming basic attack damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Armor UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 10% of the damage from basic attacks. UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
+15 Magic Penetration

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and magic damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +15 Magic Penetration UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.) (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants 25% increased Size, Slow Resistance, Tenacity and Path of Iron for 3 minutes.

Path of Iron: Moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champion's Movement Speed by 15%.

(Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Iron
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily reduces the power of enemy crowd control effects. Leaves a trail for allies to follow.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants 25% increased Size, Slow Resistance, Tenacity and Path of Iron for 3 minutes. Path of Iron: Moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champion's Movement Speed by 15%. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+60 Magic Resist
+150% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Increases all healing received by 20%.
Endgame Items.name: Spirit Visage
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +60 Magic Resist +150% Base Health Regen +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Increases all healing received by 20%.

Endgame Items.description:
+90 Armor
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+400 Mana

UNIQUE Aura: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 15%.
Endgame Items.name: Frozen Heart
Endgame Items.plaintext: Massively increases Armor and slows enemy basic attacks
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +90 Armor +20% Cooldown Reduction +400 Mana UNIQUE Aura: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 15%.

Endgame Items.description:
+300 Health
+400 Mana
+60 Ability Power

Passive: Grants +20 Health, +40 Mana, and +4 Ability Power per stack (max +200 Health, +400 Mana, and +40 Ability Power). Grants 1 stack per minute (max 10 stacks).
UNIQUE Passive - Valor's Reward: Upon leveling up, restores 150 Health and 200 Mana over 8 seconds.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Rod of Ages
Endgame Items.plaintext: Greatly increases Health, Mana, and Ability Power
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +300 Health +400 Mana +60 Ability Power Passive: Grants +20 Health, +40 Mana, and +4 Ability Power per stack (max +200 Health, +400 Mana, and +40 Ability Power). Grants 1 stack per minute (max 10 stacks). UNIQUE Passive - Valor's Reward: Upon leveling up, restores 150 Health and 200 Mana over 8 seconds. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+500 Health
+300 Mana
+100% Base Health Regen

UNIQUE Active: Grants +60% Movement Speed to nearby allies when moving towards enemies or enemy turrets for 3 seconds. After 3 seconds, a shockwave is emitted, slowing nearby enemy champion Movement Speed by 80% for 1 second(s) (90 second cooldown).

This effect may be reactivated early to instantly release the shockwave.
Endgame Items.name: Righteous Glory
Endgame Items.plaintext: Grants Health, Mana. Activate to speed towards enemies and slow them.
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +500 Health +300 Mana +100% Base Health Regen UNIQUE Active: Grants +60% Movement Speed to nearby allies when moving towards enemies or enemy turrets for 3 seconds. After 3 seconds, a shockwave is emitted, slowing nearby enemy champion Movement Speed by 80% for 1 second(s) (90 second cooldown). This effect may be reactivated early to instantly release the shockwave.

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+60 Armor
-10% Damage taken from Critical Strikes

UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15%.
UNIQUE Active: Slows the Movement Speed of nearby enemy units by 35% for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Randuin's Omen
Endgame Items.plaintext: Greatly increases defenses, activate to slow nearby enemies
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +60 Armor -10% Damage taken from Critical Strikes UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15%. UNIQUE Active: Slows the Movement Speed of nearby enemy units by 35% for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+450 Health
+45 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 25 (+1 per champion level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies.
Endgame Items.name: Sunfire Cape
Endgame Items.plaintext: Constantly deals damage to nearby enemies
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +450 Health +45 Armor UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 25 (+1 per champion level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies.

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+100% Base Health Regen
+20 Magic Resist
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Active: Grants a shield to nearby allies for 2 seconds that absorbs up to 75 (+15 per level) damage (60 second cooldown).
UNIQUE Aura - Legion: Grants nearby allies +15 Magic Resist.

(Unique Auras with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
Endgame Items.plaintext: Activate to shield nearby allies from damage
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +100% Base Health Regen +20 Magic Resist +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Active: Grants a shield to nearby allies for 2 seconds that absorbs up to 75 (+15 per level) damage (60 second cooldown). UNIQUE Aura - Legion: Grants nearby allies +15 Magic Resist. (Unique Auras with the same name don't stack.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown).

At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds.

Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player.

(Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown). At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).

Starting Items.description:
+60 Health
+15 Ability Power

Passive: +3 Mana Regen per 5 seconds.
Passive: Restores 4 Mana upon killing a unit.
Starting Items.name: Doran's Ring
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: +60 Health +15 Ability Power Passive: +3 Mana Regen per 5 seconds. Passive: Restores 4 Mana upon killing a unit.

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 5 at one time.

Click to Consume: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.
Starting Items.name: Health Potion
Starting Items.plaintext: Consume to restore Health over time
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 5 at one time. Click to Consume: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.

Starting Items.description:
UNIQUE Passive: Holds 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 120 Health and 60 Mana over 12 seconds.
Starting Items.name: Crystalline Flask
Starting Items.plaintext: Restores Health and Mana over time, refills at shop
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive: Holds 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop. UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 120 Health and 60 Mana over 12 seconds.

Starting Items.description:
Can only carry 2 Vision Wards in inventory.

Click to Consume: Places a visible ward that reveals the surrounding area and invisible units in the area until killed. Limit 1 Vision Ward on the map per player.

(Revealing a ward in this manner grants a portion of the gold reward when that unit is killed.)
Starting Items.name: Vision Ward
Starting Items.plaintext: Use to temporarily provide vision and stealth detection in an area
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Can only carry 2 Vision Wards in inventory. Click to Consume: Places a visible ward that reveals the surrounding area and invisible units in the area until killed. Limit 1 Vision Ward on the map per player. (Revealing a ward in this manner grants a portion of the gold reward when that unit is killed.)
